author: Rick
quote: Wubba Lubba Dub Dub!

author: Rick
quote: I’ll tell you how I feel about school, Jerry: It’s a waste of time. Bunch of people runnin’ around bumpin’ into each other, got a guy up front says, ‘Two plus two,’ and the people in the back say, ‘Four.’ Then the bell rings and they give you a carton of milk and a piece of paper that says you can go take a dump or somethin’. I mean, it’s not a place for smart people, Jerry. I know that’s not a popular opinion, but that’s my two cents on the issue.

Listen, Morty, I hate to break it to you, but what people call love is just a chemical reaction that compels animals to breed. It hits hard, Morty, then it slowly fades, leaving you stranded in a failing marriage. I did it. Your parents are gonna do it. Break the cycle, Morty. Rise above. Focus on science.
author: Rick
Rick
quote: What, so everyone’s supposed to sleep every single night now? You realize that nighttime makes up half of all time?

author: Rick
quote: Boom! Big reveal! I turned myself into a pickle!

author: Morty
quote: Nobody exists on purpose. Nobody belongs anywhere. We’re all going to die. Come watch TV.

author: Rick
quote: To live is to risk it all; otherwise you’re just an inert chunk of randomly assembled molecules drifting wherever the universe blows you.

author: Rick
quote: Weddings are basically funerals with a cake.

author: Rick
quote: Sometimes science is more art than science.

author: Rick
quote: If I let you make me nervous, then we can’t get schwifty.

author: Rick
quote: Listen, Morty, I hate to break it to you, but what people call ‘love’ is just a chemical reaction that compels animals to breed.

author: Rick
quote: Don’t move. Gonorrhea can’t see us if we don’t move. Wait! I was wrong! I was thinking of a T. rex.

author: Rick
quote: Have fun with empowerment. It seems to make everyone that gets it really happy.

author: Rick
quote: Listen, I’m not the nicest guy in the universe, because I’m the smartest, and being nice is something stupid people do to hedge their bets.

author: Rick
quote: I know that new situations can be intimidating. You’re lookin’ around and it’s all scary and different, but y’know, meeting them head-on, charging into ‘em like a bull — that’s how we grow as people.

author: Rick
quote: You gotta do it for Grandpa, Morty. You gotta put these seeds inside your butt.

author: Rick
quote: Morty, I need your help on an adventure. Eh, ‘need’ is a strong word. We need door stops, but a brick would work too.

author: Pickle Rick
quote: I’m a scientist; because I invent, transform, create, and destroy for a living, and when I don’t like something about the world, I change it.

author: Beth
quote: He’s not a hot girl. He can’t just bail on his life and set up shop in someone else’s.

author: Beth
quote: Honey, stop raising your father’s cholesterol so you can take a hot funeral selfie.

author: Summer
quote: So what if he’s the devil, Rick? At least the devil has a job. At least he’s active in the community.

author: Summer
quote: Unity, I’m sorry. I didn’t know freedom meant people doing stuff that sucks. I was thinking more of a ‘choose your own cellphone carrier’ thing.

author: Rick
quote: Thanks, Mr. Poopybutthole. I always could count on you.

author: Rick
quote: Excuse me. Coming through. What are you here for? Just kidding, I don’t care.

author: Rick
quote: So I have an emo streak. It’s part of what makes me so rad.

author: Mr. Needful
quote: I just want to go back to hell, where everyone thinks I’m smart and funny.

author: Beth
quote: Don’t deify the people who leave you.

author: Rick
quote: If I die in a cage, I lose a bet.

author: Rick
quote: Yeah, sure, I mean, if you spend all day shuffling words around, you can make anything sound bad, Morty.

author: Rick
quote: Don’t get drawn into the culture, Morty. Stealing stuff is about the stuff, not the stealing.

author: Rick
quote: Your parents are a bag of dicks.

author: Rick
quote: I’m sorry, but your opinion means very little to me.

author: Morty
quote: Hi Mr. Jellybean, I’m Morty. I’m on an adventure with my grandpa.

author: Summer
quote: B*tch, my generation gets traumatized for breakfast!

author: Summer
quote: You’re the little brother. You’re not the cause of your parents’ misery, you’re just a symptom of it.

author: Mr. Meeseeks
quote: Having a family doesn’t mean that you stop being an individual. You know the best thing you can do for the people that depend on you? Be honest with them, even if it means setting them free.

author: Morty
quote: Well then get your shit together, get it all together and put it in a backpack, all your shit, so it’s together. And if you gotta take it somewhere, take it somewhere, you know. Take it to the shit store and sell it, or put it in the shit museum. I don’t care what you do, you just gotta get it together. Get your shit together.

author: Rick
quote: I don’t like it here, Morty. I can’t abide bureaucracy. I don’t like being told where to go and what to do. I consider it a violation. Did you get those seeds all the way up your butt?

author: Rick
quote: Hey, muchacho, does your planet have wiper fluid yet or you gonna freak out and start worshipping us?

author: Shrimply Pibbles
quote: It’s funny to say they are small. It’s funny to say they are big.

author: Jerry
quote: God’s turning people into insect monsters, Beth. I’m the one beating them to death. Thank me.

author: Rick
quote: This pickle doesn’t care about your children. I’m not gonna take their dreams. I’m gonna take their parents.

author: Jerry
quote: Life is effort and I’ll stop when I die!

author: Rick
quote: Listen, Morty, I hate to break it to you, but what people call love is just a chemical reaction that compels animals to breed. It hits hard, Morty, then it slowly fades, leaving you stranded in a failing marriage. I did it. Your parents are gonna do it. Break the cycle, Morty. Rise above. Focus on science.

author: Rick
quote: There’s a lesson here, and I’m not going to be the one to figure it out.

author: Rick
quote: Wait a minute! Is that Mountain Dew in my quantum-transport-solution?

author: Rick
quote: You don’t get to tell anyone what’s sad. You’re like a one-man Mount Sadmore. So I guess like a Lincoln Sadmorial.

author: Rick
quote: I know about the Yosemite T-Shirt, Morty.

author: Morty
quote: Shit.

author: Rick
quote: You know you can use tissues, right?

author: Mr. Nimbus
quote: Say goodbye to your precious dry land! For soon it will be wet!

author: Rick
quote: Yeah, global warming is already doing that. But sure, yeah, go for it. Make us slightly more wet.

author: Unity
quote: I realize now I’m attracted to you for the same reason I can’t be with you; you can’t change. And I have no problem with that, but it clearly means I have a problem with myself.

author: Summer Smith
quote: Ooh yeah, shame me. At least when I’m disgusting, it’s on purpose.

author: Rick
quote: I’ve got an emo streak. It’s part of what makes me so rad.

author: Rick
quote: You ever heard about Wall Street, Morty? You know what those guys do in their fancy boardrooms? They take their balls and they dip them in cocaine and wipe them all over each other.

author: Rick
quote: I don’t like it here, Morty. I can’t abide by bureaucracy. I don’t like being told where to go and what to do. I consider it a violation. Did you get those seeds all the way up your butt?

author: Rick
quote: I’m a scientist; because I invent, transform, create, and destroy for a living, and when I don’t like something about the world, I change it.

author: Rick
quote: The world is full of idiots who don’t understand what’s important! And they’ll try to tear us apart, Morty!

author: Beth
quote: Honey, stop raising your father’s cholesterol so you can take a hot funeral selfie.

author: Morty
quote: Mr. President, if I’ve learned one thing today, it’s that sometimes you have to not give a f*ck!

author: Rick
quote: It’s society. They work for each other, Morty. They pay each other. They buy houses. They get married and make children that replace them when they get too old to make power.

author: Rick
quote: If I let you make me nervous, then we can’t get schwifty.

author: Rick
quote: Can somebody just let me out of here? If I die in a cage I lose a bet.

author: Morty

quote: Lemme check my list of powers and weaknesses: ability to do anything, but only whenever I want.
author: Rick

quote: Existence is a pain to a Meeseeks Jerry, and we will do anything to alleviate that pain.
author: Mr. Meeseeks

quote: My life has been a lie—God is dead. The government’s lame! Thanksgiving is about killing Indians!
author: Morty

quote: Gaslighting doesn’t exist, you made it up because you’re fcking crazy.
author: Morty

quote: We’ve got a lot of friends and family to exterminate.
author: Rick

quote: Now, listen—I know the two of you are very different from each other in a lot of ways, but you have to understand that as far as Grandpa’s concerned, you’re both pieces of sh*t!
author: Rick

quote: You and Unity are like—like leggings and mid-calf boots. You think you’re great together, but you’re just bringing out the worst in each other.
author: Summer

quote: I can’t wait to watch your adventure lay a huge fart.
author: Rick

quote: That’s planning for failure Morty. Even dumber than regular planning.
author: Rick

quote: I just want to go back to hell, where everyone thinks I’m smart and funny.
author: Mr. Needful

quote: If I’ve learned one thing, it’s that before you get anywhere in life, you gotta stop listening to yourself.
author: Jerry

quote: You’re down here bailing on the rest of us because you don’t want to process your grief and shame like a normal person, by drinking and mistreating others!
author: Rick

quote: Camping is just being homeless without the change.
author: Summer

quote: How do you feel about all the innocent people that are dying because of your choices?
author: Jerry

quote: Because the thing about repairing, maintaining, and cleaning is it’s not an adventure. There’s no way to do it so wrong you might die. It’s just work. And the bottom line is, some people are okay going to work, and some people—well, some people would rather die. Each of us gets to choose.
author: Dr. Wong

quote: Is evil real, and if so, can it be measured? Rhetorical question. The answer’s yes, you just have to be a genius.
